summary: 1) DEFECT DISCOVERED ON VEHICLE SAFETY INSPECTION  2) CORROSION ON DRIVERS SIDE STRUT TOWER  3) VEHICLE OPERATION IS UNSAFE, CORROSION COULD LEAD TO SEPARATION OF STRUT FROM STRUT TOWER CAUSING LOSS OF CONTROL, POTENTIAL COLLISION, VEHICLE DAMAGE AND INJURY TO OCCUPANTS.  REPAIR TO STRUT TOWER IS REQUIRED.  *TR
